## UnrecognizedEncodingError class

Signals that the given [StringEncoding](./iconv-corefoundation.stringencoding.md) specifier (IANA character set name, `CFStringEncoding` constant, or the like) is not recognized or not supported.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class UnrecognizedEncodingError extends Error 
```
